body: I get paid for my intelligence. You on the other hand spend your free time cultivating posts of people that block you like a schoolgirl. You know who I’d also block? People consistently talking about gay shit in the comments. It has nothing to do with handling an opinion fuck face and if you were even “slightly” intelligence you would have asked for clarification instead of being a low life bottom of the barrel cretin who assumes for the sake of trolling and superiority. You can’t get much sun in the comfort of your moms basement. Banning people means you don’t have to see their unsightly attempts at making conversation, kind of like what you’re doing right now. I can handle your opinion perfectly fine, it’s your unsightly gay attempts at troll bravado that make people want to block you. You’re a toddler crying, you don’t really have an opinion per se. You deathly avoid responding to logic, you then insert a couple of insults, maybe some racism (depends on how you feel) and you get that tingle of daddies dick in your ass. Anything else?
